titleStmt.title: The Kings declaration and ordinance containing the cause of his warre against the duke of Sauoy, warning his subiects, that they carrie not armes against his Maiestie: and a commandement to all true Frenchmen, to retire themselues to his obedience. According to the copie printed at Paris by Iames Mettayer, ordinarie printer to the King, 1600.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1589-1610 : Henry IV)
